pullRequest.title: Improve messaging and timestamps when containers are terminated due to unresponsive nodes
pullRequest.bodyText:
Description of the Change

Set appropriate message when pods are known to have been removed as a result of unresponsive node by Node Lifecycle Manager
Instead of deletionTimestamp from the pod delete events, we use wallTime for KillInitiated and Finished events

commit.message: Set appropriate message when the Node is confirmed lost and use the same timestamp for all events generated in podDelete

nodes.bodyText: move NodeLost to the constants file
